name: Adrenaline
description: A rare material used in few mid-level prefixes.

name: Almandin
description: A very rare ore that is connected in some way to the Underworld.

name: Amber
description: A common material in mid-level suffixes.

name: Amethyst
description: An important material used in variety of mid-high level prefixes.

name: Antidote
description: Used in low-mid level suffixes.

name: Aquamarine
description: Used in mid-level suffixes.

name: Bone Splinter
description: Used a lot in low-mid level suffixes.

name: Bronze
description: A common ore used in some high level suffixes.

name: Bull's Horn
description: Used in a lot of mid-high level prefixes in fairly low quantities so could be hard to get sometimes as smelting quantities are not huge.

name: Cerberus' Pelt
description: Rare Underworld material used in high level suffixes(?).

name: Claw
description: Rare material that drops primarily from mobs and does not act in any known prefixes or suffixes yet.

name: Copper
description: A rare building block type of material. Save them as they are really rare.

name: Cotton Wool
description: A material mainly used in low level suffixes in the range of 10-16 level.

name: Crystal
description: A common ore that is used in a number of important high level prefixes but is very limited in occurrences before character level 90.

name: Cuprit
description: A rare ore that is used in high level suffixes.

name: Diamond
description: A gemstone used in some mid-level suffixes with +Damage.

name: Dragon Scale
description: Used in high level prefixes.

name: Earth Mark
description: A common rune used in low level suffixes.

name: Emerald
description: A common gemstone used in high level prefixes with healing.

name: Essence of Reaction
description: Used in some mid-high level suffixes.

name: Fang
description: Used a lot in low-mid level prefixes.

name: Flintstone
description: A rune that is used in few mid-level prefixes mostly known for being main material for Táliths.

name: Fur
description: A common material used in various low level suffixes.

name: Garnet
description: A common gemstone used in mid-high level prefixes with healing.

name: Gauze Strip
description: Used in low level suffixes.

name: Gold Ore
description: A rare ore found in mid-high level prefixes but in small quantities.

name: Hellstone
description: A rare ore used in high level suffixes.

name: Hemp
description: A material used in low level prefixes.

name: Hydra Scale
description: Rare Underworld material used in high level prefixes.
scarcity: Medium at high levels, Very rare at low-mid levels

name: Iron
description: A rare building block type of material. Save them as they are really rare.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper is a rare gemstone used in high level suffixes.

name: Jute Patch
description: Used in low-mid level prefixes.

name: Lapis Lazuli
description: A material rarely used in mid-level prefixes.

name: Leather
description: A rare building block type of material. Save them as they are really rare.

name: Linen Strip
description: Used in low-mid level prefixes.

name: Obsidian
description: A rare ore that is used in some mid-high level prefixes.

name: Phial of Charisma
description: A rare material for some mid-high level suffixes.

name: Platinum
description: A somewhat rare ore that is used in defensive mid-level suffixes.

name: Poison Gland
description: Used in very important suffixes. Hard to get and really valuable and rare material.

name: Potion of Perception
description: An important material used in various mid-high level prefixes.

name: Protection Rune
description: A rune used in low-mid level suffixes with +Armour.

name: Quartz
description: A somewhat rare ore that is part of several high level suffixes, primarily known for "of Fire".

name: Sapphire
description: A gemstone used in low level suffixes with healing.

name: Scale
description: Used in mid-level prefixes.

name: Scorpion Poison
description: A material commonly used in low level suffixes.

name: Shadow Rune
description: A rare rune mostly used in high level suffixes and found in Underworld.

name: Silk Thread
description: Used in mid-level prefixes.

name: Silver
description: A rare ore that is precious as it's hard to find but part in small quantities in many useful mid-high level suffixes.

name: Soul Essence
description: A material that is used in very high level prefixes.

name: Sphinx Feather
description: Rare Underworld material used in high level prefixes.

name: Stone of Fortune
description: A rare rune that is used for low-mid level suffixes.

name: Storm Rune
description: An important rune that is part of a lot of good mid-high level prefixes. It's not rare but used a lot so players may always be feeling like they don't have enough.

name: Sugilite
description: Sugilite is a rare gemstone used in high level prefixes.

name: Sulphur
description: A common ore that is used in many important mid-high level prefixes.

name: Talisman of Power
description: Used in mid level suffixes.

name: Tincture of Enlightenment
description: Used primarily in low-mid level suffixes with healing.

name: Tincture of Stamina
description: Important material used in high level prefixes such as Lucius. Also used to repair Lucius.

name: Totem of Healing
description: A rune used in mid-high level suffixes with healing.

name: Typhon Leather
description: Rare Underworld material used in high level prefixes(?).

name: Velvet
description: Primarily used in mid-level suffixes.

name: Water Seal
description: A rare rune used in some mid-level prefixes.

name: Waters of Oblivion
description: A rare material used in very high level suffixes but can be smelted in large quantities from certain suffixes.

name: Wood
description: A rare building block type of material. Save them as they are really rare.

name: Wool
description: Usually required to craft low level prefixes in the range 16-31 level.
